attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why is there a difference between a private and state school???
Do anybody agree that state sector is better than a private sector??? 
Will Mr Brown make a difference to the Education in London between state and private sector???? Or will Mr Blair???

rejection.details: Your title must be a call for action, not a statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
